items.sentence: You could incriminate yourself if you're not careful.
Tom and I were in the garden when the earthquake hit.
I'm not used to dealing with these kinds of problems.
I could tell from his accent that he was a Frenchman.
It could've been much worse if Tom hadn't intervened.
It'll take us about thirty more minutes to get there.
The way Tom speaks, you can tell he's from Australia.
Can you scoot over and make room for one more person?
They never go out in the evening with their children.
I wish I had enough money to travel around the world.
